alert.note: Alert for Greenwood; Newberry; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 12:07PM EST until January 28 at 3:05AM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Columbia SC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Carolina... Saluda River At Chappells affecting Newberry, Saluda and Greenwood Counties. ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Richland, Lexington and Calhoun Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saluda River At Chappells. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Lowlands around and downstream from Chappells become flooded. Cattle grazing river bottomland should be moved to higher ground. At 16.0 feet, Extensive farmland and river bottomland around and downstream from Chappells become flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EST Thursday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 15.7 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and take action if necessary. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1215 AM EST.
